title: Early experiments in accelerating science with GPT-5
description: OpenAI introduces the first research cases showing how GPT-5 accelerates scientific progress across math, physics, biology, and computer science. Explore how AI and researchers collaborate to generate proofs, uncover new insights, and reshape the pace of discovery.

title: OpenAI and Target team up on new AI-powered experiences
description: OpenAI and Target are partnering to bring a new Target app to ChatGPT, offering personalized shopping and faster checkout. Target will also expand its use of ChatGPT Enterprise to boost productivity and guest experiences.

title: How Scania is accelerating work with AI across its global workforce
description: Description: Global manufacturer Scania is scaling AI with ChatGPT Enterprise. With team-based onboarding and strong guardrails, AI is boosting productivity, quality, and innovation.

title: Intuit and OpenAI join forces on new AI-powered experiences
description: OpenAI and Intuit have entered a $100M+ multi-year partnership to launch Intuit app experiences in ChatGPT and expand Intuit‚Äôs use of OpenAI‚Äôs frontier models to power personalized financial tools.

title: OpenAI named Emerging Leader in Generative AI
description: OpenAI has been named an Emerging Leader in Gartner‚Äôs 2025 Innovation Guide for Generative AI Model Providers. The recognition reflects our enterprise momentum, with over 1 million companies building with ChatGPT.

description:

title: Scania accelerates operations across its global workforce with ChatGPT
description: Scania builds the trucks, buses, and transport systems that keep the world moving. With AI in their engineering-led organisation, they're evolving from vehicle maker to sustainable transport ecosystem leader. Read more: https://openai.com/index/scania/
